channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: How do mass lay-offs affect regional economies?
item.description: How do mass lay-offs affect regional economies? by Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs, Regions and Cities has an embargo on Friday 20 January 2023 at 7:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs, Regions and Cities

item.title: Measuring the joint distribution of household income, consumption and wealth at the micro level
item.description: Measuring the joint distribution of household income, consumption and wealth at the micro level by Centre for Well-Being, Inclusion, Sustainability and Equal Opportunity has an embargo on Wednesday 25 January 2023 at 7:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Well-Being, Inclusion, Sustainability and Equal Opportunity

item.title: OECD Public Governance Reviews: Honduras - Inclusive and Effective Governance for Better Outcomes
item.description: OECD Public Governance Reviews: Honduras - Inclusive and Effective Governance for Better Outcomes by Directorate for Public Governance has an embargo on Monday 30 January 2023 at 17:00.

item.title: EU Country Cancer Profile: Austria 2023
item.description: EU Country Cancer Profile: Austria 2023 by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Wednesday 1 February 2023 at 10:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.title: Evaluation of Active Labour Market Policies in Finland
item.description: Evaluation of Active Labour Market Policies in Finland by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Thursday 2 February 2023 at 8:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Costa Rica 2023
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Costa Rica 2023 by Economics Department has an embargo on Monday 6 February 2023 at 16:00.

item.title: Development Co-operation Report 2023 - Debating the Aid System
item.description: Development Co-operation Report 2023 - Debating the Aid System by Development Co-operation Directorate has an embargo on Tuesday 14 February 2023 at 8:00.

item.title: OECD Environmental Performance Reviews: Israel 2023
item.description: OECD Environmental Performance Reviews: Israel 2023 by Environment Directorate has an embargo on Wednesday 8 March 2023 at 9:00.

item.title: Nordic Lessons for an Inclusive Recovery? Responses to the Impact of COVID-19 on the Labour Market
item.description: Nordic Lessons for an Inclusive Recovery? Responses to the Impact of COVID-19 on the Labour Market by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Thursday 16 March 2023 at 9:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs
